entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Rain or periods of snow this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023
